essays.title: Career Goals
essays.prompt: What are your short-term and long-term career goals? How will the Darden MBA help you achieve these goals?

essays.title: Leadership Experience
essays.prompt: Describe a time when you led a team or group. What did you learn about yourself as a leader?

essays.title: Personal Growth
essays.prompt: Describe a time when you experienced significant personal growth. What did you learn about yourself?
